name: Galaga: Demons of Death
description:
Galaga: Demons of Death is an action game developed by NAMCO. It was originally released in 1988. Bandai published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Galaga: Demons of Death on NES.
It was directed by Shigeki Yokoyama. It was scored by Nobuyuki Ohnogi.
